sentences: Ma olen kirjutanud kirja oma vennaile.
Kui sa ei tea midagi, siis lihtsalt lase see ja kirjuta midagi paremat.
context: The verb 'kirjutab' is in the third person singular form meaning 'he/she/it writes'. In past tense, it becomes 'on kirjutanud', which means 'has written'. The word can be used both literally and metaphorically to describe writing actions.
